main.name: Emmanuel Okwuzi
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Emmanuel. I've been coding for over 2 years now. I am concerned about making user friendly web apps that provides service or meets the need of a person or a larger group of people. I stay up to date with new tech and incorporate best practices to help build better applications that are scalable and responsive. When I'm not writing code, I watch Anime and TV shows. I am also an NFT, Metaverse and Blockchain technology enthusiast.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to anytime
